entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 1:28 AM EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 1:28 AM EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 1:28 AM EDT Friday 5 May 2023
